languages.text: {n}Мужчина натянуто улыбается.{/n} "Что вы были... очень близки с... а, забудьте! Я просто так сказал. Просто вежливое приветствие".
{n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина натянуто улыбается.{/n} "Что вы были... очень близки с... а, забудьте! Я просто так сказал. Просто вежливое приветствие".

traits.locale_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! It's just a saying. A polite greeting."
{n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! It's just a saying. A polite greeting."
{n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."
{n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."
{n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

languages.text: {n}他努力地挤出个笑容。{/n}“我听说你和……那个谁很亲密……啊，当我没说！我是在胡说八道，只是在尬聊而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}他努力地挤出个笑容。{/n}“我听说你和……那个谁很亲密……啊，当我没说！我是在胡说八道，只是在尬聊而已。”

languages.text: {n}Se fuerza a sonreír.{/n} «Que era una persona muy... cercana a... ¡ah, olvídelo! Nada, en realidad. Solo intentaba continuar la conversación».
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se fuerza a sonreír.{/n} «Que era una persona muy... cercana a... ¡ah, olvídelo! Nada, en realidad. Solo intentaba continuar la conversación».

languages.text: {n}彼は無理に笑顔を作った。{/n}「あんたが…あいつと近いって…いや、やっぱ忘れてくれ！深い意味はなかったんだ。間を持たせるために適当に喋っただけだし」
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は無理に笑顔を作った。{/n}「あんたが…あいつと近いって…いや、やっぱ忘れてくれ！深い意味はなかったんだ。間を持たせるために適当に喋っただけだし」

languages.text: {n}Er lächelt gezwungen.{/n} "Dass Ihr ... eine enge Verbindung hattet mit ... ach, vergesst es! Es hat nichts zu bedeuten. Ich mache nur Konversation."
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lächelt gezwungen.{/n} "Dass Ihr ... eine enge Verbindung hattet mit ... ach, vergesst es! Es hat nichts zu bedeuten. Ich mache nur Konversation."

languages.text: {n}Il se force à sourire.{/n} « Que vous étiez... très proche de... Ah, oubliez ça ! Ce n'étaient que des paroles en l'air pour faire la conversation. »
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se force à sourire.{/n} « Que vous étiez... très proche de... Ah, oubliez ça ! Ce n'étaient que des paroles en l'air pour faire la conversation. »

languages.text: {n}Zoraki gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şeyle çok yakın olduğunuzu... Neyse, boş verin! Altında anlam aramayın. Benimkisi öyle hoşbeş işte."
languages.original_text: {n}He forces a smile.{/n} "That you were... very close with... ah, forget it! I didn't mean anything by it. Just making conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zorla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şeyle çok yakın olduğunuzu... Neyse, boş verin! Altında anlam aramayın. Sadece muhabbet etmeye çalışıyordum."
